roleset.name: give a patient medication to interfere with normal clotting, having recieved blood thinning medication

example.name: Typical Transitive
example.text: Dr. John anticoagulated the patient using IV heparin.

example.name: Arg0 and Arg1
example.text: Dr. Suzy's anticoagulation of Patient Bob was successful.

example.name: With drug
example.text: If no thrombus is evident, heparin anticoagulation may be initiated.

roleset.note: ANTICOAGULATE-V NOTES: Based on data in medical QA corpus (Framed by Anwen 07/20/10) (from anticoagulate.101-v)
ANTICOAGULATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb frame anticoagulate.101. Framed by Anwen Feb 2011 (from anticoagulation.01-n)
ANTICOAGULATED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from anticoagulated.01-j)
